backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, game stats, and in-progress runs with strict access control checks for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping gameplay requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of all major frontend files including game engine, UI, controls, and styles.
frontend/docs/IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md: High‑level documentation outlining the project structure and implementation approach for the Space Shooter game.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based CSS defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level app managing menu/play modes, high score handling, saved run resume, and theme configuration.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading state, error recovery, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/RotateDeviceOver: Overlay prompting users to rotate their device to landscape mode for gameplay.
frontend/src/game/controls/Joystick.tsx: Implements a touch and mouse-driven joystick that reports normalized movement based on drag distance and handles resets on visibility or orientation changes.
frontend/src/game/controls/ShootButton.t: Defines a touch and mouse-activated shoot button that triggers shooting state changes and resets on visibility or orientation changes.
frontend/src/game/controls/useCombinedCo: Merges keyboard, joystick, and touch shooting inputs into a single control state, choosing the strongest movement source and OR-ing shooting.
frontend/src/game/controls/useKeyboardCo: Tracks WASD/arrow and spacebar keys to produce directional movement and shooting state.
frontend/src/game/persistence/inProgress: Saves, loads, and clears in-progress run data in localStorage with version validation.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useInProgr: Provides React Query hooks to check, load, save, and clear in-progress runs using local storage and an optional backend actor.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useSavedSt: Loads and saves persistent game stats through a backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/game/render/GameCanvas.tsx: Renders the game state onto a fullscreen canvas, drawing the player, bullets, enemies, and effects with vector graphics and glow effects.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for all game entities, game state, phases, and controls.
frontend/src/game/ui/Hud.tsx: Renders the game's HUD including score, timer, level, boss progress, and a pause button with responsive UI styling.
frontend/src/game/ui/TouchControlsDebugO: Displays a small debug overlay showing touch detection, forced controls status, and pause state.
frontend/src/game/useGameEngine.ts: Implements the core game loop and state management including levels, enemies, bullets, timing, and pause/resume handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDynamicViewport.ts: Tracks visual viewport changes and updates a CSS variable for stable mobile layout sizing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, loading, login, clearing, and tracking login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLandscapeOrientati: Detects device orientation, exposes portrait/landscape state, and provides optional orientation lock helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing for game-specific query separation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a large set of CSS variables for theme and responsive UI sizing across devices.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app with query and identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Main gameplay screen that wires controls, game engine state, orientation lock, autosaving, and triggers game over callbacks while rendering canvas, HUD, and mobile controls.
frontend/src/screens/MenuScreen.tsx: Renders the main menu with background, logo, high score display, and buttons to start or continue a saved run.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, animations, and themes with neon palette and utility plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the game’s level progression, boss mechanics, HUD behavior, and countdown timer requirements.
